lead_paragraph: In the book "Insectopedia," the entomologically obsessed anthropologist Hugh Raffles describes the amazing variety and number of bugs hanging out in the air column thousands of feet above the earth. We thought of this when a reader, June Wohlhorn, sent us this photo of a dragonfly that lighted on her 10th-floor window screen on Pearl Street in the financial district one recent Saturday afternoon.
snippet: A very large insect visits a financial district dweller: a photograph.
abstract: A very large insect visits a financial district dweller: a photograph.
